# Organizations Guide

## Overview

Backend module for tenant management.

## Structure

- `organizations.service.ts`: Organization CRUD.
- `organizations.controller.ts`: Endpoints.
- `organizations.module.ts`: Module.

## Patterns

- Root tenant entity.
- Cascades to all data.</content>
